examples.sentence: The rabbi explained the Hanukkah traditions with a menorah demonstration.
Our neighborhood rabbi organizes weekly Torah study sessions.
Maimonides is regarded as the greatest rabbi of the Middle Ages.
The young scholar was honored with the title rabbi at 30.
The dispute was settled by three rabbis specializing in halakhic law.
To become a rabbinical judge, one must train for additional years after rabbi ordination.
The Chief Rabbi of the UK attended the interfaith dialogue at Westminster Abbey.

examples.sentence: The rabbinic court debated the kosher status of lab-grown meat.
His rabbinic beard reached the length specified in Talmudic texts.
Modern startups sometimes apply rabbinic principles to business ethics.
Her thesis analyzed rabbinic interpretations of AI morality.
The Midrash is a classic work of rabbinic literature.
The rabbinical debates in Talmud are like ancient Twitter threads.
His grandfather left a collection of rabbinical commentaries.
The Torah scroll contains original rabbinical Hebrew.
She's studying rabbinical script for biblical research.
The rabbit in the moon palace pounds mochi with a mortar in Chinese legends.
Her WeChat avatar is a rabbit wearing Dior sunglasses.
British nobles used to rabbit with specially trained ferrets.
It's illegal to rabbit in this protected area.
He rabbited the stupid rules and started his own business.
Just rabbit those negative comments!
My aunt keeps rabbiting on about her new Tesla.
Beware of the rabbit hole of douyin videos at midnight.
The politician's speech turned the crowd into an angry rabble.
Online forums can sometimes feel like a rabble of conflicting opinions.
The police struggled to control the rabble after the football match.
Historical records describe the rioters as a drunken rabble.
The novel vividly portrays the lives of the rabble in 19th-century London.
Charity workers tried to improve conditions for the city's rabble.
The gardener used a rabble to gather fallen leaves.
Ancient farmers crafted rabbles from sturdy branches.
Protesters rabbled outside the government building until midnight.
The fans rabbled when the concert was suddenly canceled.
He rabbled the campfire to keep it burning brightly.
Grandma rabbled the coal stove every morning.
The rabble-rouser was arrested for inciting violence.
We rabbled together some furniture for the impromptu party.
The rabid fan smashed his phone when his idol announced dating news.
She became rabid after seeing spoilers for her favorite drama.
Rabid collectors queue overnight for limited edition sneakers.
His rabid devotion to hotpot makes him drive 3 hours for authentic broth.
The rabid nationalist refused to use any foreign-brand smartphones.
Rabid anti-fans organized a blacklist campaign against the actor.
Rabid fans of the boyband crashed the ticketing website in 3 seconds.
The film subtly criticizes rabid nationalism through sci-fi allegory.
The dog chased the mailman rabidly, foaming at the mouth.
Fans were cheering rabidly when Jay Chou appeared on stage.
He rabidly opposes any form of online censorship.
The activist campaigned rabidly against genetically modified food.
The stray dog was foaming at the mouth, showing classic signs of rabies.
Ancient Chinese medical texts described rabies as 'mad dog disease' over 2000 years ago.
After being bitten by a monkey at Mount Emei, I needed five rounds of rabies vaccines.
The raccoon washed its food in the river like a little bandit.
Toronto's trash pandas (raccoons) have PhD-level problem-solving skills.
In the 1920s, raccoon coats were the ultimate campus fashion statement.
The vintage raccoon fur hat still kept its striped pattern after decades.
After binge-watching Cdramas for 3 nights, she got serious raccoon eyes.
The museum exhibits costumes from every race in Yunnan.
DNA tests revealed his mixed race background.
The crab race at seafood market amused tourists.
She won the 100-meter race by wearing light-up sneakers.
White-water rafting in the race requires special permits.
Delivery drivers race against time during lunch hours.
I'll race you to the hotpot restaurant!
The smartphone arms race focuses on camera pixels now.
Surgeons raced against time to save the panda.
The Queen's hat flew off at Ascot Racecourse last summer.
Hong Kong Jockey Club operates the world's most profitable racecourse.
The Yangtze River racecourse is crucial for cargo ships.
Ancient Romans built racecourses to supply water to cities.
The Olympic racecourse was resurfaced with recycled sneakers.
Drones recorded every angle of the racecourse during F1 competition.

examples.sentence: The champion racehorse retired with 18 consecutive wins like an undefeated general.
Betting on racehorses causes more heart attacks than spicy hotpot.
The young racer beat the champion by eating 50 dumplings in 3 minutes.
Electric scooter racers weave through Beijing hutongs like kung fu masters.
The black racer slid across the path faster than a Didi bike.
Unlike its name suggests, the racer snake actually prefers sunbathing to racing.
The street racer modified his Santana like a Transformers robot.
The new racetrack in Shanghai can accommodate F1 races.
Olympic runners slipped on the wet racetrack.
The Hong Kong Jockey Club maintains the world's most luxurious horse racetrack.
She lost a month's salary betting at the horse racetrack.
The museum exhibits racial artifacts from ancient Silk Road traders.
DNA tests can reveal fascinating racial heritage stories.
Racial diversity makes Chinese university canteens offer both dumplings and naan bread.
The racial harmony in Singapore is reflected in its four official languages.
Fighting racial discrimination is like removing all the chili peppers from hotpot - it loses its colorful essence.
Airport security should avoid racial profiling just as doctors shouldn't judge illnesses by appearances.
The professor's lecture exposed how racialism influenced colonial policies.
Social media platforms are combating racialism with AI detection tools.
Nazi Germany used pseudoscientific racialism to justify atrocities.
Modern genetics has completely debunked racialism theories.

examples.sentence: The professor condemned racialist theories as pseudoscience.
Racialist policies were officially abolished in 1994 in South Africa.
The court ruled the landlord's refusal as racialist behavior.
Many countries have laws against racialist hiring practices.
Historical documents revealed the racialist atrocities during WWII.
The museum exhibits artifacts from racialist regimes.
Racialist bus seating policies sparked the Montgomery Bus Boycott.
The racialist 'separate but equal' doctrine was overturned in 1954.
The notorious racialist was banned from international forums.
Modern racialists often disguise their views with coded language.
The university admits students without discriminating racially.
Historically, some neighborhoods were divided racially.
The study focuses on genetically racially diverse groups.
Some diseases manifest differently racially.
The Queen's love for horse racing is well known in the UK.
Racing in rainy conditions requires special horseshoes.
Formula 1 racing attracts millions of viewers worldwide.
Street racing is illegal but appears in many movies.
China is developing its own motor racing culture.
Doctors were racing against time to save the earthquake victims.
The museum exhibit exposes how racism shaped urban planning policies.
Calling COVID-19 'Kung Flu' is a blatant act of racism.
The algorithm was found to have built-in racism against darker skin tones.
Her TED Talk discusses microaggressions as subtle forms of racism.
The education report reveals systemic racism in school admissions.
K-pop idols speaking up for anti-racism inspires global fans.

examples.sentence: The professor was exposed as a racist after his offensive comments about Asian students.
Grandma unknowingly made racist remarks about the new African neighbor's hairstyle.
The racist policy that banned hijabs was finally abolished last year.
His racist jokes at the company dinner made everyone uncomfortable.
The celebrity lost three endorsement deals due to his racist remarks on Weibo.
Some video games subtly spread racist ideology through character designs.
The spice rack in her kitchen looks like a rainbow.
The overhead rack on high-speed trains can hold 20kg.
The memory loss put her through emotional rack.
He racked the wine bottles carefully in the cellar.
The detective racked his brains to solve the mahjong theft case.
The old bookshelf racked after years of use.
She racked up 100,000 frequent flyer miles eating airplane meals.
His suit was off the rack but looked custom-made.
